title: Cutting-edge AI was supposed to get cheaper. It’s more expensive than ever.

content:

title: Knockverse Unveils WTMF: The AI-Powered Digital Companion
description: Knockverse Pvt Ltd has launched a beta version of its AI app, WTMF, aiming to blend artificial intelligence with personal productivity and emotional well-being tools. title: Elon Musk's xAI sues engineer for allegedly taking secrets to OpenAI

content:
